## Summary
A clear, one-line description of the feature.

## Problem / Motivation
What problem does this solve? Why do we need it?

## Proposed Solution
How should this work? Be as specific as you can.

## Alternatives Considered
Any alternative approaches you've thought about.

## Component
Which part of the platform does this affect?
- [ ] Arena server (matchmaking, API)
- [ ] OpenRA mod (game integration)
- [ ] MCP server (agent tools)
- [ ] Broadcaster (commentary, TTS)
- [ ] Web portal (UI, spectating)
- [ ] Agent protocol (SAP spec)
- [ ] Infrastructure (cloud, deployment)
- [ ] Discord / Twitch integration
- [ ] Documentation
